name: cv
description: As a senior front-end engineer with over 15 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performing, user-friendly, and maintainable web applications. I am passionate about creating solutions that meet the needs of users and businesses alike. I am also a strong advocate for continuous learning and improvement, and I am always looking for new ways to expand my knowledge and skills.
author: Harris Sidiropoulos

document.title: Harris Sidiropoulos - CV
document.description: Senior front-end engineer with over 15 years of experience.
